channel.title: Abouts on Jerry Caligiure
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Jerry Caligiure

item.description: Hello, my name is Jerry Caligiure. Welcome to my blog! I am a father, husband, software developer, and science and math entusiast Those are the subjects this blog will most likely cover My major interests / activities at the time of writing this are: Programming in Go Working on Engo, an ECS game engine written in Go Working on an SVG parser for Go that’ll turn SVGs into a list of commands that can then convert to an image.
